pullrequest.title: Fix help messages generated by segway -h and segway annotate -h

content.raw:
Please make changes according to

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Mgi\_9-4TmFjIu2x92ow8lJgHSyqb8CiO0cKs4SFYvDU/edit](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Mgi_9-4TmFjIu2x92ow8lJgHSyqb8CiO0cKs4SFYvDU/edit)

Then replace the output in the description and flag for my review again. Thanks!
